# Fly2Any - AI-Friendly Site Information
# Last updated: 2025-01-19
# Contact: support@fly2any.com

## About Fly2Any
Fly2Any is a comprehensive travel search and booking platform that helps travelers find the best flight deals from 500+ airlines worldwide. We offer real-time price comparison, AI-powered recommendations, and seamless booking experiences.

## What We Offer
- Flight search and comparison from 500+ airlines
- Hotel bookings from 1.5M+ properties globally
- Real-time price tracking and alerts
- Multi-city and flexible date searches
- AI-powered travel recommendations
- 24/7 customer support
